title: How to Make French Beans Curry in Andhra Style

steps.headline: Add the chopped French beans to a mixing bowl, colander or saucepan.
Wash the beans thoroughly under running water.
Drain the water with the help of your palm.
steps.description: If you are using a colander, the water will self-drain.

steps.headline: Add fresh water to a saucepan.
steps.description: Add enough to cover the beans.

steps.headline: Boil the French beans until just tender.
Add the oil to a large frying pan.
steps.description: Add the red chilies, mustard seeds, cumin seeds and white lentils. Saute these ingredients together.

steps.headline: Sprinkle the grated fresh coconut over the beans.
Serve the French beans curry with rice or a flatbread like roti.

text: Preparing the French Beans Add the chopped French beans to a mixing bowl, colander or saucepan.  Wash the beans thoroughly under running water.  Drain the water with the help of your palm. If you are using a colander, the water will self-drain. Add fresh water to a saucepan. Add enough to cover the beans. Boil the French beans until just tender.  Frying the French Beans Curry Add the oil to a large frying pan. Add the red chilies, mustard seeds, cumin seeds and white lentils. Saute these ingredients together. Add the boiled French beans.  Add salt to taste. Mix well. Sprinkle the grated fresh coconut over the beans.  Mix well.  Serve the French beans curry with rice or a flatbread like roti.
sentences: Preparing the French Beans Add the chopped French beans to a mixing bowl, colander or saucepan.
Wash the beans thoroughly under running water.
Drain the water with the help of your palm.
If you are using a colander, the water will self-drain.
Add fresh water to a saucepan.
Add enough to cover the beans.
Boil the French beans until just tender.
Frying the French Beans Curry Add the oil to a large frying pan.
Add the red chilies, mustard seeds, cumin seeds and white lentils.
Sprinkle the grated fresh coconut over the beans.
Serve the French beans curry with rice or a flatbread like roti.
